title: Cinderella
short_plot_summary: Cinderella, a kind-hearted girl who is mistreated by her stepmother and stepsisters, goes to the royal ball with help from her fairy godmother, but has to leave before midnight.
explanation: A dress, symbolizing Cinderella's transformation from a girl in rags to a beautifully dressed princess at the ball
A mouse, representing Cinderella's loyal animal friends who help her with chores and offer support
A pumpkin, indicating the magical transformation by the fairy godmother that turns a pumpkin into a carriage for Cinderella
A clock showing midnight, illustrating the magical spell's time limit and Cinderella's rush to leave the ball
A glass slipper, symbolizing the iconic item that leads to Cinderella's happy ending with the prince
